players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I am shocked that Alice was killed so early. We need to be careful with our votes today to avoid losing another innocent player."
Diana: "I have information that Bob is the mafioso. We must vote to arrest him now to protect the town."
Diana: "I urge everyone to vote for Bob immediately. We cannot afford to let the mafioso continue killing us. Trust me, I have investigated him and know the truth."
You: "I find Diana's accusations very suspicious, especially since Charlie hasn't said a word. Diana might be trying to divert attention from herself by being overly aggressive."
